page.title: 12The River
page.content: The Chelmer and Blackwater Navigation runs through our area.Before it was canalised it was River Chelmer.The countryside around it is very attractive.There are three locks and weirs in our area.They are{Cutton, {Stonhams }and {Little Baddow Lock.} Beside the river there is a lot of farmland.The river has to be dredged once a year so that the barges can get through. Lots of people go there to fish and to canoe.It is a very quiet spot with plenty of wild life and flowers along the well kept tow path.The new road comes right next to the river.The builders have been making the new road for a year. We are concerned it will spoil the countryside and pollute the river.{Is this progress.?}
